name: Basketball: Ball in the Basket
description:
Presenting to you one of the Bestselling Casual
games of 2014 Basketball: Ball in the basket now on the App Store!
"Addictive and Fun! Level Design at its best" - AppleWrapper
"Challenging Level Design.. awesome replay value.." - BestAppleGames
Basketball: Ball in the Basket is a challenging Physics based Puzzler which will keep you hooked for hours, till you'll be able to sort out how to finish the awesomely designed Levels.
Finish the Levels by putting the colorer balls in the the same coloured Basket. Getting progressively difficult, you will have to basket different coloured balls in the same level.
A fun challenging physics based puzzler, Basketball: Ball in the basket will keep you occupied for a long time to come.
Replay the levels and score better to be the best in the game.
Challenge your friends and get to the top of the leaderboard! Prove that your the best at Basketball: Ball in the basket

==== Features====
• iPhone and iPad Support
• Leaderboards
• 25 Awesome Levels, More to come!!
• Free!!
Who doesn't love Basketball ;)
